slide.title: WSDL Proxy Generation

example.title: Generating a Static Client from WSDL

slide.example:
<?php 
require_once('SOAP/Client.php'); 

class WebService_GoogleSearchService extends SOAP_Client {
    function WebService_GoogleSearchService() {
        $this->SOAP_Client("http://api.google.com/search/beta2", 0);
    }
    function doGetCachedPage($key, $url) {
        return $this->call("doGetCachedPage", 
                        array("key"=>$key, "url"=>$url), 
                        array('namespace'=>'urn:GoogleSearch',
                            'soapaction'=>'urn:GoogleSearchAction',
                            'style'=>'rpc',
                            'use'=>'encoded')); 
    }
    function doSpellingSuggestion($key, $phrase) {
        return $this->call("doSpellingSuggestion", 
                        array("key"=>$key, "phrase"=>$phrase), 
                        array('namespace'=>'urn:GoogleSearch',
                            'soapaction'=>'urn:GoogleSearchAction',
                            'style'=>'rpc',
                            'use'=>'encoded')); 
    }
    function doGoogleSearch($key, $q, $start, $maxResults, 
                            $filter, $restrict, $safeSearch, 
                            $lr, $ie, $oe) {
        return $this->call("doGoogleSearch", 
                        array("key"=>$key, 
                        "q"=>$q, 
                              "start"=>$start, 
                              "maxResults"=>$maxResults, 
                              "filter"=>$filter, 
                              "restrict"=>$restrict, 
                              "safeSearch"=>$safeSearch, 
                              "lr"=>$lr, 
                              "ie"=>$ie, 
                              "oe"=>$oe), 
                        array('namespace'=>'urn:GoogleSearch',
                            'soapaction'=>'urn:GoogleSearchAction',
                            'style'=>'rpc',
                            'use'=>'encoded')); 
    }
}
?>
